welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kumi, Uganda! Known for its vibrant markets, friendly locals, and picturesque scenery, this charming city has so much to offer. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Kumi has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Good friends restaurant
restaurants.description: Good friends restaurant is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: ARISE Restaurant
restaurants.description: ARISE Restaurant is a african restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Soroti Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight operations at Soroti Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
